item.description:
Join us for a movie and dinner. The movie "Love" is a romantic comedy set in 2 cities - Beijing and Taipei. It's not often that Asian movies play at the regular theatres. The movie is in Mandarin with English subtitles.

Here's a little blurb about the movie

We've all been touched by love, but no one really understands it, nor can anyone explain why we do the things we do when we are in love. This is a story that happened in two cities, Taipei and Beijing. A story about eight lonely people searching for love. All that happened and every sacrifice that was made all for LOVE.  

Here is a trailer for the film: 

 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=427IdU8S1u8  

Correction & update - We will see the 3:15 pm showing. We will meet in the theatre lobby at 2:30 pm. We will try to get as many discounted tix as we can ($6.50 tix). After the movie we will head to Asian Garden at 28 Harrison Ave for 6 pm dinner.

This RSVP is for both the movie and dinner unless you indicate otherwise. If you plans change, please remember to update your RSVP. We hope you will join us.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the lobby area.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Love
